name: Clinic Sales Analytics
query:
SELECT 
SI.name As "InvoiceNo:Link/Sales Invoice:80",
SI.posting_date As "InvoiceDate:Date:80",
SI.customer as "CustomerNO:Link/Customer:80",
SI.customer_name as "CustomerName:Data:120",
PA.doctor_name as "Doctor:Data:100",
SI.appointment as "Appointment/ClientPackage:Data:150",
SI.rounded_total as "Invoice Amount:Currency:120",
SI.paid_amount as "Paid Amount:Currency:120",
SI.outstanding_amount "Outstanding Amount:Currency:150"
from  `tabSales Invoice` as SI 
inner JOIN `tabClient Appointment CT` PA 
on PA.NAME = SI.appointment or PA.NAME = CONCAT('C',SI.appointment)
WHERE SI.docstatus = 1
and SI.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
and SI.posting_date <= %(to_date)s 
and ( SI.doctor = %(physician)s or %(physician)s = 'all' or PA.physician = %(physician)s )
UNION ALL
SELECT 
SI.name As InvoiceNo,
SI.posting_date As InvoiceDate,
SI.customer as CustomerNO,
SI.customer_name as CustomerName,
CP.doctor_name as Doctor,
SI.client_package_schedule,
SI.rounded_total,
SI.paid_amount,
SI.outstanding_amount
from  `tabSales Invoice` as SI 
inner JOIN `tabClient Package Schedule` CP 
on CP.NAME = SI.client_package_schedule
WHERE SI.docstatus = 1
and SI.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
and SI.posting_date <= %(to_date)s 
and ( SI.doctor = %(physician)s or %(physician)s = 'all' )
